symbols.name: sap.makit.Axis
symbols.description: Base element for the Axis object for the Chart.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color of the primary line. Accept the following format: standard name format: gray, red, black, etc hex format: #ff00ff rgb format: rgb(256, 0, 256)

properties.name: showGrid
properties.description: Indicates whether to show grid of the Axis in the chart area

properties.name: showLabel
properties.description: Indicates whether to show label of the Axis by the primary line

properties.name: showPrimaryLine
properties.description: Indicates whether to show the primary line of the Axis on the chart area

properties.name: thickness
properties.description: The line thickness of the primary line

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

Constructor for a new Axis.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

symbols.name: sap.makit.Chart

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the Chart

properties.name: legendPosition
properties.description: Legend position all chart types except Bar chart. Default position for Pie/Donut chart is Left. All other chart's default position is None. Note: the default legend position is set when the chart type is set first time, subsequent change to the chart type will keep using initial legend position unless it is changed explicitly by user.

properties.name: lineThickness
properties.description: Specify the line thickness of the line graph. Only applies to Line chart type.

properties.name: maxSliceCount
properties.description: Set the maximum number of slices in a Pie/Donut chart. If exceeding the specified value, the rest will be categorised into a single slice. Only applies to Pie/Donut.

properties.name: numberOfVisibleCategories
properties.description: The number of categories that will be visible on the chart at any time. The minimum value is 2. If not set, the number of visible categories will be automatically adjusted depending on the screen size

properties.name: primaryColorPalette
properties.description: Allow a chartâ€™s color palette to be modified without affecting the other charts' color palette. If not set, the chart will use the default color palette defined in the theme. Accept an array of color in string format or hex format. e.g. 0xff0000 "red" "rgb(255,0,0)"

properties.name: rangeSelectorStartPosition
properties.description: Specify the range selector start position, default value is 0.

properties.name: showRangeSelector
properties.description: Specify whether the range selector should be visible.

properties.name: showTableValue
properties.description: Toggle to display the table value on a Bar chart. Only applies to Bar chart.

properties.name: showTableView
properties.description: Toggle to display table view

properties.name: showTotalValue
properties.description: Specify whether to show the sum of the value for Waterfall/Waterfall Bar chart. Only applies to Waterfall/WaterfallBar chart.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Chart type

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the Chart

symbols.name: sap.makit.Value
symbols.description: Represents the Value data region of the Chart.

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The text label representing this Value (on value bubble or table's header)

properties.name: expression
properties.description: The user should map the column on this property. The expression allows more advanced column mapping. Instead of just specifying the column name (e.g. revenueValue), the user can use SAP expression language e.g. Assuming the user has a revenueValue column and an operatingCost column, the user can specify the following expression: "revenueValue - operatingCost" the resulting value displayed in the chart will be the arithmatic operation result on these two columns.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Number formatting for the value. Accepted values: number currency percent roundedN - where N represents number of decimal places e.g. rounded4

properties.name: locale
properties.description: Comma separated locales for specifiying values in different locale. The locale will be mapped in the same order as the series data. e.g. zh-CH, en-US, de-DE The first zh-CH will be applied to the value of the first series, en-US will be applied to the second series. Currently will only work with 'currency' format. Supported locales: en, zh, de, fr, es, ru, ja, pt and their more specific variations such as en-CA, es-AR, zh-HK, etc.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given
